#Trump und #SurpremeCourt lassen grüßen.

Trump confirms US envoy Witkoff to visit Russia 'next week' amid rising tensions

US President Donald Trump on Sunday said his envoy Steve Witkoff will visit Moscow next week, days before a sanctions deadline. The announcement came after Trump revealed two US nuclear submarines had been deployed […]

enhanced_posts.text: #Epstein #Trump #Russia Trump biographer Michael Wolff: “In 2004, Epstein believed himself to be the high bidder on a piece of real estate in Palm Beach—a house. His bid was $36 million. He took his friend Trump around to see the house, to advise him on how to move the swimming pool.

L'Agence US de Protection de l'Environnement ne s'occupe plus de lutte contre le changement climatique.
Encore une offensive idéologique de Trump ? Oui mais c'est probablement aussi une vision financière car cela s'accompagne d'un transfert des responsabilités aux états.
#Trump #Climate
